name: Local Export
description: Utilize this plugin to transfer web transaction data to a designated location on your local storage.

configuration.label: Storage path
configuration.description: Storage path in which the data object will be stored.

configuration.label: Object Prefix
configuration.description: Object prefix for the data object name while pushing to the storage path. '/' is not allowed in the object prefix.

configuration.label: Maximum File Size (in MBs)
configuration.description: Maximum size of data object to be stored in the storage path. (Value should be between 1 to 100 MB.)

configuration.label: Maximum Duration (in Seconds)
configuration.description: Maximum duration after which the data object should be stored in the storage path.
